sentence.text: Oral and pharyngeal cancers combined were associated with loci at 6p21.32 (rs3828805, immunoglobulin production involved in immunoglobulin mediated immune response), 10q26.13 (rs201982221, phosphate-containing compound metabolic process) and 11p15.4 (rs1453414, G protein-coupled receptor signaling pathway-TRIM5).

entity.text: immunoglobulin production involved in immunoglobulin mediated immune response

sentence.text: Oral cancer was associated with two new regions, 2p23.3 (rs6547741, biological_process) and 9q34.12 (rs928674, extracellular matrix organization), and with known cancer-related loci-9p21.3 (rs8181047, regulation of cyclin-dependent protein serine/threonine kinase activity-AS1) and 5p15.33 (rs10462706, apoptotic process).

entity.text: regulation of cyclin-dependent protein serine/threonine kinase activity

sentence.text: Oropharyngeal cancer associations were limited to the human leukocyte antigen (HLA) region, and classical HLA allele imputation showed a protective association with the class II haplotype HLA-DRB1*1301-HLA-DQA1*0103-immunoglobulin production involved in immunoglobulin mediated immune response*0603 (odds ratio (OR) = 0.59, P = 2.7 x 10-9).

entity.text: immunoglobulin production involved in immunoglobulin mediated immune response
